Pre-Game Insights: Morocco’s national team, led by coach Walid Rikraki, is set to make significant changes to its squad for its upcoming match against Congo.
Rikraki plans to introduce young defender Shadi Riad into the starting line-up, after his impressive form for Real Betis in La Liga.
Shadi Riad’s performances for Real Betis this season have been so impressive that it is hard to ignore him in the national team.
Nayef Akrad has returned from injury, but Rikraki is still deciding between him and Ghanem Saiss to make the best decision on the starting line-up.
Sevilla striker Youssef Nasiri will be put on the bench, after Nasiri expressed his anger in the previous match against Zambia after being substituted early in the second half.
Ayoub El Kaabi is expected to start in the upcoming match, capitalizing on his speed and goal-scoring ability.
Sofiane Rahimi remains a second option for the attack, as he has high individual skills and the ability to create goalscoring opportunities.

Sofiane Amrabet will return to his position in the defensive midfield, after missing Friday’s game due to a suspension after receiving a red card in the Moroccan national team’s last match at the Africa Cup of Nations.
Oussama El Azouzi performed well in the previous game against Zambia, but Amrabet’s return means adjustments in the midfield to optimize balance.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The upcoming match against Congo is an important opportunity for the Moroccan national team to consolidate their position in the World Cup qualifiers.
After a disappointing draw against Zambia, the Atlas Lions will be looking for a positive result to restore the confidence of the fans.
Others: The team faces some challenges such as injuries and suspensions that affect Rikraki’s choices in the starting line-up.
The new changes require time for coordination and understanding between the players, to ensure optimal performance in the match.
Defensive stability is expected to bring greater stability to the team, making it more difficult to penetrate the defense.
Thanks to the changes in the attacking line, Rikraki hopes to increase the team’s attacking effectiveness and score more goals.
Moroccan fans have high hopes for the changes made by Al-Rikraki, hoping that they will contribute to improving the team’s performance and achieving the desired results.
